BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 020259Z JUN
   BY M/V VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-53.17S 041-29.18W, 24-02.45S 041-57.48W,
   24-16.77S 041-49.52W, 24-12.43S 041-52.08W,
   24-24.20S 041-50.32W, 24-43.97S 041-46.35W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 020359Z JUN.
